00092 // My own derived class for managing my configuration files:
00093 //
00094 class MyParams : public Params 
00095 {
00096 public:
00097   
00098   MyParams( int argc, char **argv ) : Params( argc, argv ) { }
00099   
00100   ~MyParams( ) { }
00101 
00102 
00103   void readParams()
00104   {
00105     // Call the main program with parameters "-conf [filename]"
00106     if ( scanFrom(confFile.c_str()) ) 
00107       { 
00108         std::cout << "Name of the configuration file: " << confFile << std::endl;
00109       } 
00110     else
00111       {
00112         std::cerr << "No valid configuration file given! (" << confFile  << ")" << std::endl;
00113         exit(0);
00114       }
00115   }
00116 
00117   void io( std::istream& is, std::ostream& os, FileUtil::iotype type )
00118   {
00119     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Seed  "       , Seed         , 1234u , type);
00120     FileUtil::io( is, os, "PopSize "     , PopSize      , 100u  , type);
00121     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Dimension "   , Dimension    , 2u    , type);   
00122     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Iterations "  , Iterations   , 1000u , type); 
00123     FileUtil::io( is, os, "FileNumber "  , FileNumber   , 1u    , type);
00124     FileUtil::io( is, os, "NumOfBits "   , NumOfBits    , 10u   , type);  
00125     FileUtil::io( is, os, "DspInterval " , DspInterval  , 10u   , type);   
00126     FileUtil::io( is, os, "MOOF  "       , MOOF         , 1u    , type);
00127     FileUtil::io( is, os, "STOPPING "    , STOPPING     , false , type);
00128     FileUtil::io( is, os, "UseGrayCode " , UseGrayCode  , true  , type);       
00129     FileUtil::io( is, os, "CrossProb "   , CrossProb    , 0.6   , type);     
00130     FileUtil::io( is, os, "FlipProb "    , FlipProb     , 0.002 , type);
00131     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Start "       , Start        , -2.   , type);
00132     FileUtil::io( is, os, "End "         , End          , 2.    , type);
00133   }
00134         
00135   // Method to show the current content of the class variable: 
00136   void monitor( )
00137   {
00138     std::cout << "Seed        " << Seed         << std::endl;//1234);
00139     std::cout << "PopSize     " << PopSize      << std::endl;//100);
00140     std::cout << "Dimension   " << Dimension    << std::endl;//2);   
00141     std::cout << "Iterations  " << Iterations   << std::endl;//1000); 
00142     std::cout << "FileNumber  " << FileNumber   << std::endl;//1);
00143     std::cout << "NumOfBits   " << NumOfBits    << std::endl;//10);  
00144     std::cout << "DspInterval " << DspInterval  << std::endl;//10);   
00145     std::cout << "MOOF        " << MOOF         << std::endl;//true);
00146     std::cout << "STOPPING    " << STOPPING     << std::endl;//false);
00147     std::cout << "UseGrayCode " << UseGrayCode  << std::endl;//true);       
00148     std::cout << "CrossProb   " << CrossProb    << std::endl;//0.6);     
00149     std::cout << "FlipProb    " << FlipProb     << std::endl;//0.002);
00150     std::cout << "Start       " << Start        << std::endl;//-2);
00151     std::cout << "End         " << End          << std::endl;//2);
00152   }
00153 
00154   unsigned Seed;
00155   unsigned PopSize;
00156   unsigned Dimension;
00157   unsigned Iterations;
00158   unsigned FileNumber;
00159   unsigned NumOfBits;
00160   unsigned DspInterval;
00161   unsigned MOOF;
00162   bool STOPPING;
00163   bool UseGrayCode;
00164   double CrossProb;
00165   double FlipProb;
00166   double Start;
00167   double End;
00168 };
00169 
00170 // main program
00171 int main( int argc, char* argv[] )
00172 {
00173   unsigned i,ii,k,t;
00174         
00175   MyParams param( argc, argv );
00176         
00177   param.setDefault( );
00178   //param.readParams();
00179   param.monitor();
00180         
00181   //Other Variable
00182   const Interval RangeOfValues( param.Start, param.End );
00183   double f1=0, f2=0;
00184         
00185   double *PF1 = new double[ (unsigned)param.PopSize ];
00186   double *PF2 = new double[ (unsigned)param.PopSize ];  
00187   double *OF1 = new double[ (unsigned)param.PopSize ];
00188   double *OF2 = new double[ (unsigned)param.PopSize ];  
00189         
00190   // initialize random number generator
00191   Rng::seed( param.Seed );
00192 
00193   const unsigned fileno = param.FileNumber;
00194   char filename[500];
00195 
00196   // define populations
00197   PopulationMOO parents   ( param.PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( param.Dimension * param.NumOfBits ) );
00198   //PopulationMOO offsprings( param.PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( param.Dimension * param.NumOfBits ) );
00199   PopulationMOO offsprings( param.PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( param.Dimension * param.NumOfBits ) );
00200 
00201   // Set Minimization Task
00202   parents   .setMinimize( );
00203   offsprings.setMinimize( );
00204 
00205   // Set No of Objective funstions
00206   parents   .setNoOfObj( 2 );
00207   offsprings.setNoOfObj( 2 );
00208 
00209   // Temporary chromosomes for decoding
00210   ChromosomeT< double > dblchrom;
00211 
00212   // initialize all chromosomes of parent population
00213   for ( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i )
00214     dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( );
00215   
00216 
00217   // evaluate parents
00218   for ( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i ) {
00219     dblchrom.decodeBinary( parents[ i ][ 0 ], RangeOfValues, param.NumOfBits, param.UseGrayCode );
00220     switch(param.MOOF)
00221       {
00222       case 1:
00223         f1 = SphereF1( dblchrom );
00224         f2 = SphereF2( dblchrom );
00225         break;
00226       case 2:
00227         f1 = DebConvexF1( dblchrom );
00228         f2 = DebConvexF2( dblchrom );
00229         break;
00230       case 3:
00231         f1 = DebConcaveF1( dblchrom );
00232         f2 = DebConcaveF2( dblchrom );
00233         break;
00234       case 4:
00235         f1 = DebDiscreteF1( dblchrom );
00236         f2 = DebDiscreteF2( dblchrom );
00237         break;
00238       case 5:
00239         f1 = FonsecaConcaveF1( dblchrom );
00240         f2 = FonsecaConcaveF2( dblchrom );
00241         break;
00242       default:
00243         std::cerr << "Specify fitness function. Current setting of MOOF (1-5):" << param.MOOF << std::endl;
00244         break;
00245       }
00246     parents[ i ].setMOOFitnessValues( f1, f2 );
00247     PF1[ i ] = f1;
00248     PF2[ i ] = f2;
00249   }
00250 
00251   // iterate
00252   for ( t = 1; t < param.Iterations+1; ++t ) {
00253     std::cout << "Generations : " << t << std::endl;
00254     // copy parents to offsprings
00255     offsprings.selectBinaryTournamentMOO(parents);
00256 
00257     // recombine by crossing over two parents
00258     for ( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( )-1; i += 2 ){
00259       if ( Rng::coinToss( param.CrossProb ) ){
00260         offsprings[ i ][ 0 ].crossoverUniform( offsprings[ i+1 ][ 0 ]);
00261       }
00262     }
00263     // mutate by flipping bits
00264     for ( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i ){
00265       dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ).flip( param.FlipProb );
00266     }
00267     // evaluate objective function
00268     for ( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i ) {
00269       dblchrom.decodeBinary( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ], RangeOfValues, param.NumOfBits, param.UseGrayCode );
00270       switch(param.MOOF)
00271         {
00272         case 1:
00273           f1 = SphereF1( dblchrom );
00274           f2 = SphereF2( dblchrom );
00275           break;
00276         case 2:
00277           f1 = DebConvexF1( dblchrom );
00278           f2 = DebConvexF2( dblchrom );
00279           break;
00280         case 3:
00281           f1 = DebConcaveF1( dblchrom );
00282           f2 = DebConcaveF2( dblchrom );
00283           break;
00284         case 4:
00285           f1 = DebDiscreteF1( dblchrom );
00286           f2 = DebDiscreteF2( dblchrom );
00287           break;
00288         case 5:
00289           f1 = FonsecaConcaveF1( dblchrom );
00290           f2 = FonsecaConcaveF2( dblchrom );
00291           break;
00292         default:
00293           std::cerr << "Specify fitness function. Current setting of MOOF (1-5):" << param.MOOF << std::endl;
00294           break;
00295         }
00296       offsprings[ i ].setMOOFitnessValues( f1, f2 );
00297       OF1[ i ] = f1;
00298       OF2[ i ] = f2;
00299     }
00300 
00301     // Selection
00302     parents.crowdedTournamentSelection( offsprings );
00303     for ( k = 0; k < parents.size( ); k++ ){
00304       PF1[ k ] = parents[ k ].getMOOFitness( 0 );
00305       PF2[ k ] = parents[ k ].getMOOFitness( 1 );
00306     }    
00307 
00308     if ( param.STOPPING ){
00309       if ( t % param.DspInterval == 0 ){
00310         std::cout << "\nHit return key" << std::endl;
00311         fgetc( stdin );
00312       }
00313     }
00314   } // Iteration
00315 
00316   // Data Output
00317   ArchiveMOO archive( param.PopSize );
00318   archive.minimize( );
00319   for ( ii = 0; ii < param.PopSize; ii++ ){
00320     archive.addArchive( parents[ ii ] );
00321   }
00322   archive.nonDominatedSolutions( );
00323   sprintf( filename, "Archive%i.txt", fileno );
00324   archive.saveArchive( filename );
00325   std::cout << "\nThe result is stored in " << filename << "\n" << std::endl;
00326   std::cout << "Number of Solutions" << std::endl;
00327   std::cout << "Number of Objectives" << std::endl;
00328   std::cout << "Solution 1 (f1,f2,...)" << std::endl;
00329   std::cout << "Solution 2 (f1,f2,...)\n" << std::endl;
00330 
00331   std::cout << "Hit return key" << std::endl;
00332   
00333   fgetc(stdin);
00334 
00335   delete [] PF1;
00336   delete [] PF2;
00337   delete [] OF1;
00338   delete [] OF2;
00339 
00340   return 0;
00341 
00342 }
Generated on Wed Dec 16 13:07:18 2009 for MOO-EALib by  1.4.7
